Package it.unipd.dei.se.index

Class BodyField

java.lang.Object
org.apache.lucene.document.Field
it.unipd.dei.se.index.BodyField
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.lucene.index.IndexableField
public class BodyField extends org.apache.lucene.document.Field
Represents a Field for containing the body of a document.

It is a tokenized field, not stored, keeping only document ids and term frequencies (see IndexOptions.DOCS_AND_FREQS in order to minimize the space occupation.

Since:
1.00
Version:
1.00
Author:
Nicola Ferro (ferro@dei.unipd.it)
